website_summaries.verdict: Despite some small drawbacks, the feature-packed Plantronics BackBeat Pro is an intriguing option for those looking for a wireless headphone with active noise-cancelling.
pros: The Plantronics BackBeat Pro features both wireless Bluetooth and noise-canceling in a sturdy, comfortable design
The headphones sound decent, are packed with features, have excellent battery life and come with a nice carrying pouch
cons: Design has a little too much of an office vibe to it
bass and treble may be a little too hyped for some people

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are great initially. They have good sound and look really ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great initially. They have good sound and look really nice. However, I've now had two sets of headphones rip in the earmuff. The first time, Plantronics replace them under warranty. The second time, they said no because the headphones were out of warranty, even though it was on the replacement set they sent. I took very good care of them and always transported the headset in the provided case. Right now, I wouldn't buy another set of headphones from Plantronics as they are clearly not living up to their old manufacturing standards.
customer_reviews.author: John Downey

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancelling and sound. Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Works seemlessly with my iPhone and iPad. I listen to podcasts and music. If a call comes in, music is paused and then continues where I left off after the call. I have never used the plugin for listening, I only use the wireless function. It works for me. My only complaint is that the material on the ear pads and headset are breaking down. I just ordered replacements. I expect better quality after paying over $150.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse S.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITH GOOGLE PIXEL PHONE!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! DOES NOT WORK WITH GOOGLE PIXEL PHONE! I have tried and tried everything and nothing works. It cuts out, pops, etc. making it impossible to listen. I did notice when I turn wifi off on the phone, and it uses data, on a program like Spotify, all is fine. The minute I turn wifi on, it starts messing up again. There are some posts on this and "fixes" but none of them work. Might not be just these headphones. When they DO work the sound is very good, deep, etc. This review is a warning for Google Pixel owners and Google completely ignoring the issue.
customer_reviews.author: King David

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Posting after almost 1.5 years of use. These are fantastic headphones, especially for the price. From and operation standpoint I'd say they would be a five star review for me; however, I recently noticed the glue/weld on the foam cover from the right earpiece is coming undone. Looking through other comments from people who have left reviews after a year of use, it seems to be common issue for one or both of these seams to come undone sometime after 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, except for the mic
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. Little background, I work in IT and all day on the phone. I have used this headset for at least 8 hours a work day for more than a year. It has served me well with no electronic issues. Noise cancellation is amazing, I have people around me all the time talking and moving with little noise filtering into my audio. I hear everything clearly. My only compliant and would have been a deal breaker if I would have known about the area mic. The mic when speaking on the phone is atrocious, the person on the phone at times cannot hear me well and the noise around sometimes bleeds into the mic.
customer_reviews.author: IT1013

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Best sounding blue tooth head phones I've ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, Best sounding blue tooth head phones I've ever had. These don't feel heavy to me at all and the noise cancellation works well. They produce rich lifelike music. The blue tooth pairing is very simple with these. This is just an awesome well designed pair of headphones for the price. Buy them.....5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bros

customer_reviews.title: these are so much better than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: OMG! these are so much better than what I expected. Plantronics designers really looked at the headphones and improved on what a pair of headphones can be. Sounds fantastic! The features are fantastic and very well thought out. Remove the head phones and it knows to pause your music. Volume control on the headphone turns up the iPad itself. Fast forward through a song by bumping the control ring forward. a quick silence button allows you to quickly mute the sound and listen without removing the phones themselves. Noise canceling worked so good I never hear the stewardess on the plane. No issues what-so-ever. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like them. I do find that when I actiate the Mic button to hear what is going on around me the music does decrease greatly. With that said if you need the Mic to hear something it would be nice if it automatically paused your player, but you can tap the pause first - which is what I would recommend. The fit, for me, is nice and comfortable and the sound is really good for my ears. I do wish there was an app with these that had an EQ so no matter what you were listening to you could tailor the sound. All in all, for the short time I've had them I'm pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: PipeFighter

customer_reviews.title: They really hurt my ears
customer_reviews.text: 1 star for sound quality, and another star for good connectivity / stability. These hurt my ears so bad. They're also very heavy. That's the first thing I noticed when I put them on. I actually didn't notice the pain until I removed the headphones and realized my ears were throbbing and touching them even just slightly made them hurt. The pain lasts for like 10 minutes after I remove them. I'm really disappointed because I really wanted a gaming headset and thought this was perfect. It may be good for listening to music once in a while, but nothing longer than 1 hour. I have average sized ears that don't really stick out or anything.. this sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Moon

customer_reviews.title: Not quality materials
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very good from these headphones, fit comfortably and the noise cancelling is great. The issue I have with this product is the quality of the materials. The part that touches my head, the surround around the ears keeps tearing and falling apart. The first time this happened the manufacture sent me a new set, immediately and quickly, but now here I am 1 year later, and the same problme has happened, the black cloth has torn away from the earpieces. I don't use them very much at all, certainly not on a daily basis. I would expect a LOT more durable and quality product from an item that is priced so high.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Winters

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome! I use them everyday and couldn't be happier. The features are pretty cool like when you take them off the music pauses, when you turn them on a voice tells you what the battery level is, and the volume and change song features are super easy. The noise cancelling is pretty decent for the price of the headphones but you will still hear some background noise. The battery life is long compared to other bluetooth headphones. I like these more than Bose because Bose require batteries where as this is re-chargeable. I love these and would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but they fall apart
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with these headphones, for the first year. They have a great sound (for a non-audiophile) and the active noise-cancelling works quite well for the price. However, the materials on the ear surrounds have started to fall apart. I use these exclusively at my office, to help concentration and block out noise in my open floor-plan office. On average, that's probably 2 or 3 times per month. Over the two years that I have owned them, that's less than 50 uses. It's disappointing as, other than the foam and cloth falling apart, I have been very happy with these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Robinhood

customer_reviews.title: Sub par Headphones will not purchase or advise purchasing these if quality is of concern.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that for the price the ear cover stitching was simply defective. This happened outside the period to return by 20 days. I was on travel and could not get this taken care of. But a STRONG NO BuY from me.
customer_reviews.author: IB_Bass MaN78

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I have ever owned. Absolutely reliable with great battery life and great sound. The phone answering feature is great with a microphone that really picks up your voice. The controls are simple to operate from the two ear pieces. I had bought a cheap bluetooth headset brand that lasted about three months. I have had this product for almost a year and it is great. The controls never fail to obey and the battery seems to last forever. The noise cancelling feature also works great. I cannot think of one negative thing to say about this product.
customer_reviews.author: ontheway

customer_reviews.title: JUST PASS!!!
customer_reviews.text: These started off as a five star item and quickly became a 1. The headphones tore just as others said they would. My GOD I cannot believe how much I paid and now they look like crap. Plantronics . . . for being NASA's go to electronics, you SUCK! I will NEVER buy another item made by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Taggart

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your Buck in Wireless Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These Headphones are excellent. I have used several other wireless headphones and these are by far the best. Pros: - Much longer battery life than other headphones. Longer play time between charges. - Sound quality is as good as headphones that are twice the price - Can connect to two different Bluetooth devices, so can go straight from phone to computer - Comfortable for extended periods of time - Lots of buttons to provide control from headset Cons: - Are slightly bulky - May not be the most attractive pair of headphones
customer_reviews.author: B. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good, but too loud at lowest setting!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good with a few bugs. The lowest volume setting is too loud for most of what I'd want to use it for. In the office I can't use these to have quiet music in the background. I also can get them to pair with my brand new ThinkPad. Plantronics says there isn't the right driver but my IT department says every driver is installed and says it is a problem with the headphones. They can connect, but then they won't play anything. Work fine with my phone. If they could push an update that addressed the volume issue I'd give these 5 stars as they're very good for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G

customer_reviews.title: So far I like these headphone with some reservations
customer_reviews.text: So far I like these headphone with some reservations. I love all of the features and their locations, but these guys are pretty heavy. I think they also should be shaped more for ears rather than round. I'm getting that white noise hum withe the noise cancelling feature turned on, but as long as something is playing it's not too distracting. I use them when I run my backhoe and both the passive and active noise reduction is admirable. I've only had them a short while so I will update this when there is more to report.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed this headset
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I really enjoyed this headset. The sound was good quality (though I am by no means an audiophile), they fit well anough, though would become uncomfortable when worn for hours on end. The noise cancelling feature seemed to work better than expected for the price point. However, about two months after purchase, when activating the noise cancelling feature, it would result in an intermittent beeping/humming sound. The noise cancelling was the primary reason for me purchasing this headset, so that ended up being a dealbreaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The headphones themselves are great. Noise cancellation is average but good enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones themselves are great. Noise cancellation is average but good enough for most flights and office conditions. Audio is good and they are very comfortable. There are some annoying drawbacks however. Sometimes, the volume would be set to maximum and the dial on the headphones won't change it whatsoever. The biggest downside I feel was the quality of the material. The lining of the foam cushion on the earpiece started tearing after about an year and a half of use. Just lasted long enough to be out of warranty. I expected an item of this price to have lasted much longer. It's not unusable yet but I fear the fabric will tear all the way soon enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mukund Ramakrishna

customer_reviews.title: ... buying these not sure if they would be a good choice. I am quite impressed with them
customer_reviews.text: I took a gamble buying these not sure if they would be a good choice. I am quite impressed with them. They sound amazing and they function as expected. My first pair had a strange pulsating sound (very soft) in one ear, but second replacement pair was perfect. Good battery life. Rich, full sound. Works great with my Android and Apple devices. Range is probably one of the best I've seen for a bluetooth device. The noise cancellation is almost as good as Bose products. The "listen" feature is nice to hear ambience around you.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great for low latency connection to guitar amp output with bluetooth transmitter
customer_reviews.text: Got these mainly because their bluetooth supports the aptX "low latency" spec as I'm using them to pair with the amp that my electric guitar is plugged into. I also bought the Aukey BT-C1 bluetooth transmitter that supports the low latency aptX and have it plugged into the headphone jack output of the amp. Now I can hear the effects from my amp without disturbing my household, plus with the low latency setup now there is no delay when I strum a note to when I hear it. See my detailed review of the Aukey for more info on this.
customer_reviews.author: snooker

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: It does everything it advertises quite well. Good battery life and compatible with my iPod, Motorola Droid and Samsung Galaxy S10. The volume and skip features implementation are simple to use and very efficient. I will agree that the base response is a bit heavy but use of EQ settings in your device takes care of this issue. Rather have too much bass than not enough since I can customize that myself. One little issue which is why I don't give it 5 stars has to do with noise cancellation, Don't expect Noise Cancellation to preform as well as the the Bose headsets, but then again the price of the Plantronics BackBeat PRO make up for the difference in performance.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbert Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had found these sooner
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about buying from Plantronics since I had never heard of them, but kept hearing great things about these headphones. Definitely glad I decided to buy them. They fit great, are very comfortable, don't clamp or push down on my head (looking at you, Logitech UE9000's), connect easily, and sound fantastic. I won't go into details on sound, but check out head-fi.org for what people have said about them. These things could easily go for $250+. They blow Beats out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Will Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I had this item for almost a year and have used it half dozen times traveling all over the world. The longest flight I had was a little over 14 hours and I used it the majority of the flight. I also used it flying back to the US and it still had more than half of the charge. The sound quality is incredible and it automatically puts my music on pause when I move it away from my ears. The bass is full and the treble is crisp. I absolutely love this product! Well worth the price for the value and performance.
customer_reviews.author: mb4snr

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking to upgrade my in ear headphones for sometime. I decided on Backbeat Pro for the wireless Bluetooth range, battery life, price. I was able to pair them to my I-Phone and I-pad very easy after I put the headphones on, the direction doesn't really say put them on :) I love the way they sound. The external microphone button is great I can hit it then I'm able to hear normal talking. ( I play poker allows me to hear without taking the headphones off.) So far I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W Hill

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelation is crap
customer_reviews.text: No idea how everyone is saying it's good at noice cancelation...they reduce noice, even a relatively quiet hum like AC, by only about 25-30%. Returning them immediately. they don't even fit over ears right. Can't comment of music sound...didn't bother. I got them for the above, for which they fail.
customer_reviews.author: NYCreview

customer_reviews.title: Used for a 23 hour flight to Thailand and everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for a 23 hour flight to Thailand and everything worked but the enclosed headphone cable was little lose in fitting into the 777 entertainment plug had to adjust the cable when plane movement was heavy. Only the last hour of flight did ear start hurting but just take off for 10 min. then was all right.after 2 years of use the ear piece fell apart now the cushion shows. See there are replacement's for the L&R earpices online.
customer_reviews.author: jms

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad set of bluetooth headphones with cool features not seen elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: There are pros and cons to these cans for sure. I liked that they worked well and connected easily using bluetooth. The button that enables the microphones on the headset that amplifies your hearing capability and allows you to talk to people with the headphones still on was a pretty cool feature, but the loud whistle of the noise cancelling while listening to my music was a hard turn off. In the end I had to send these back, and decided to stay away from bluetooth headphones entirely. The technology is not ready for anyone who wants quality sound in their music.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: They stopped working after awhile
customer_reviews.text: Headphones stopped working after 33 days. Just past the Amazon return policy. Noise cancellation never did work so they never did block out the outside sound sound quality was fair at best but the worst thing is they simply stop working they don't turn on anymore don't charge whatever turned into another throwaway item from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: jimmy d. elliott

customer_reviews.title: I'd give them 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great button placement, comfortable fit, easy to connect, good noise reduction. These headphones are so much better than the Sony headphones that I paid quite a bit for. Those headphones had poor button placement, slipped off my head all the time, and finally refused to connect any more. These headphones will connect and not use the battery with the supplied chord. Quick charging, holds a charge for a very long time. I would give them 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Use for sewing. When my surger and sewing machine are going, I don't have to blare the volume on my movies or audio book. Before I was using ear buds and having to turn the volume up too loud to hear over my machines. Very happy with purchase. I'm still able to hear noises around me, but it muffles them out enough for my needs. The price was right for the function I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing music interrupted by constant ticking, bad mic, and painful ears
customer_reviews.text: My music sounds amazing through Plantronics BackBeat PRO. It sits over my earlobes, but sadly the ears get sweaty very quickly, and the Helix gets pretty painful after an hour of wearing. Everyone hearing me through the mic has claimed that I am inaudible. UPDATE: A month or so into using it, I hear a lot of ticking sound while listening to music, as if a mechanical relay is being activated. This was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wireless headphones.  Great value!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent even with ANC on. Really effective at quieting the background noise on long plane flights. Love the large controls making it easy to pause or fast forward or back with just a quick twist or tap of the knobs on either side. Excellent battery life too. Listened for several hours while wireless with no problem. Nice quality charging cable and audio cable as well as a nice velvet lined storage bag. Easy to stow in the backpack when on the move.
customer_reviews.author: M. Russo

customer_reviews.title: They sound wonderful and the noise reduction works great on planes but ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are as ugly as hell but they are seriously legit headphones! They sound wonderful and the noise reduction works great on planes but anything above an engine hum and these don't do much. The sensors that tell them to turn off if you take them off are a little too sensitive, if you even move them around on your left ear it will turn the music off. But really you can't come up with too many other weaknesses. If you want a BT, noise canceling quality headphone then really you can't do better.
customer_reviews.author: uphoto75

customer_reviews.title: great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Battery life is really great. Great sound. All the features I would ever want. Works really well with cell phone also. My only complaint is they are quite big and a bit heavy but that was ok with me. I like to wear them when working out indoors but I need to put headband under them to absorb the sweat. Also, they are not compatible with my plantronics savi wireless phone headset. That would have been great for me. I cant get them to work with my laptop yet. I think it needs a special driver.
customer_reviews.author: Paul lifeisgood

customer_reviews.title: Started off great but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about them except that the battery stops taking a charge after 14 months. For the money I feel like the battery should last longer than that. I can still use them plugged in but the sound quality and noise reduction is poor compared to when they are on battery power and you also lose all the functions (volume, play/pause/fast-forward/skip, etc...)
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought these instead of the others
customer_reviews.text: Try the Bose, Skullcandy, Beats, anything you want, then try these. Yes they are a little heavier than the Bose but my God, they are awesome and for the price, it's a no brainer. If you're the kind of person who gets off knowing the word Bose is on the side of your headphones and you want to show off to everyone, then ok, pay the extra money. If you want an awesome sounding headphone and want/need to save some money, then you MUST buy these. These are the smart purchase. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: xrayd3

customer_reviews.title: These things are bad ass. They sound great
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while before posting this just to see if they lasted. These things are bad ass. They sound great, the controls are great, they're pretty damn durable, and they sound great(yeah I said it twice). The thing I like is when someone comes up and needs something and I have to take them off, the song stops, when I put them back on the song start back up right where I left off. No hitting pause or anything. They're smart as hell.
customer_reviews.author: charles lanier

customer_reviews.title: Ear cups take away one star
customer_reviews.text: These headphones provide great sound, great bass, great sound cancelling, are light weight and do all the other things right. Except one thing that takes away one star. Our ears are oblong and the ear cups are round. The result is that the lower ear is pressed against the head making them uncomfortable in anything over a half hour. This would give me pause to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Siepker

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect warranty service or for it to last
customer_reviews.text: leather cups wear out and tear very quickly and customer support is nearly non existent. Once you get through they will say they are not a repairable item (lots of similar products are) and brush you off. Stick with Bose or Sony and get better service or at least not spend so much on cheap construction.
customer_reviews.author: Handymel

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is very good. it is a little weighted towards the bass
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before I purchased this. The sound quality is very good. it is a little weighted towards the bass, but mid range and highs are very good as well. Blue tooth range is good. Links easily with my Samsung galaxy note 4. Noise canceling is good and Battery Life is excellent. I were this while working in my home office, talking on the cell., cooking and Walking the Dogs. It is great to be hands free with out worrying about yanking on a cord. I don't think this would be a good fit while jogging, but good for almost anything else..
customer_reviews.author: James W Mares

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Unit
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set!! Dream mix of lows, mids, and highs. Used with my work computer for calls, iPhone, and MacBook Pro. All work very clean and was able to detect the device just fine. Controls are super easy to use, nice big buttons for answering a call or playing music. Volume is a turn dial that is the ear pod. Battery lasts FOREVER!! I used it for a whole week, 4-6 hours per day and it was still at medium battery. Great unit, HIGHLY recommend, audiophiles check this one out!
customer_reviews.author: Oh, Hello!

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with these. Why didn't I make the jump to this price point before? Definitely worth 3+ cheaper headsets. I use them for work calls and have discovered a lot of what I thought was bad cellphone reception was old headphones/headsets. Also use them for walking around the grocery store, etc. I've gotten a few odd looks, but I don't care, I have jams.
customer_reviews.author: RAko890c

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfortable Headset
customer_reviews.text: These headphones continue to impress me. Two weeks of use, and I love them. The noise canceling is not on par with Bose, but nobody is. It takes the highs and lows of background noise. But don't expect your girlfriend to be yelling at you and not hear it. I like the way these headphones fit, very comfortable. The battery is amazing though! I go a whole week without needing charging wearing these two work, around the office sparsely and back home. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Aptus

customer_reviews.title: Fit and feel are very comfortable. This would be some of the best money ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had many headphones in my 65 years. These Plantronic headphones are superb. Clarity at all frequencies and a rich bass that makes me smile on those really low notes. The bass is not booming but penetrating. Words don't do it justice. Volume is controlled by a large dial on the outside of one of the rear cups.... Hurray.... It makes so much sense. Fit and feel are very comfortable. This would be some of the best money you could spend to get a fabulous product that really delivers.
customer_reviews.author: James Clagett

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is amazing, ANC is good
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure hearing the reviews online, I have worn these for 4-5 hrs straight. Battery life is amazing, ANC is good, not as good as BOSE, but defiantly noticeable. For $150 or under I think its the best out there for ANC Bluetooth headphone. Good Hi/Mid/Bass I'm very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Dave and Katie

customer_reviews.title: An awesome gift for friend or family member...
customer_reviews.text: What a romantic gift to get! One reads... the other does TV. One does music at a level that melts ear wax, the other has respect for the soft tones. One's doing an audible book while cleaning the kitchen stove without having to rattle the windows to hear it. No dangling chord to worry over and tether you to one spot...
customer_reviews.author: Innocent Bystander

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck$$ headphones on the market.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have been amazing. I have had them on my head and around my neck for the past week and I have nothing but positive things to say. The headphones without the noise cancelling feature turned block out so much noise and the wireless capabilities are great. I walked 250ft away before realizing my phone was on my desk and not in my pocket and the sound was still clear with 1 or 2 instances of cutting out. For the price these are some of the best headphones out there. They are a big large and not as sleek as other brands but if that doesn't bother you then I say this is your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Langstaff

customer_reviews.title: I really liked these, but I decided to return them
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these, but I decided to return them. I wanted a relatively discrete headphone for my walk to and from the train station. I listen to talk, not music, and I need good noise reduction or I miss words. These looked great, but look very bulky. I didn't want to walk the street with what looked like studio headphones. So I'm still looking for something that will fit my need better.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Spearman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic BT noise cancelling 'phones
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. The major issue I have is that you Cant use the ambient microphone with phone calls so you could tend to yell. The sound is great and volume control is very graduated and easy to use. The noise reduction could be better, you can hear some noise come through on an airplane. I feel the Bose might offer better suppression but only at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Slvrscoobie

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well for my two 9.5 hour flights. You can still hear a little (which I think is to be honestly expected) but they cut down outside noise tremendously. The option to use Bluetooth or cord to connect to a device means you can use these with an airplane's entertainment system. I would recommend this product to anyone who needs noise canceling headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth and noise cancelling for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Pairing took some time for some reason my phone wouldn't see the headphones so I had to go to their site and trouble shoot it. but solved the issue. Bass is deep and amazing, noise cancelling works really good. Best battery life as others have said. I have only charged them 1 time since using for on/off for 2 weeks. I probably will try to baby them so I dont have the ear cups come apart as some have had because I like them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, but problems connecting to TV via Bluetooth transmitter
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are a little heavy but sound quality is excellent. Noise cancelling seems pretty good too. I bought these to connect to a TV and, so far, have not been successful. I bought a Bluetooth transmitter by Avantree (Priva Wireless Bluetooth Audio Transmitter for TV with aptX Low Latency Codec). When connected, there's an irritating noise (like someone banging a trashcan lid every few seconds. Plus, there's a hiss! I don't think this problem stems from the headset, as the Bluetooth connection to my phone is crystal clear. I don't want to return this item but I can't use them for the actual purpose I intended. Anyone know a low latency BT transmitter that works with this headset?
customer_reviews.author: Mega Dolphin

customer_reviews.title: The phone feature works better than expected as well
customer_reviews.text: These are the real thing. Everything works well as described and the sound is superb. The phone feature works better than expected as well. The noise cancelation switch is really good. I can barely hear my treadmill so I don't have to have the volume up as loud and that's a great feature alone. Really like the volume ring on the side and the toggle feature. Bottom line......get this one. I fully endorse it.

customer_reviews.title: they are very comfortable and provide great sound
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and provide great sound. Battery life is crazy good, and their reception distance blows all of my other headphones out of the water. Using the Plantronics hub software I was able to turn off the ear sensors that turn the music on and off, which is functionality I did not care for.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cisar

customer_reviews.title: Good Ergonomics, usefull ANC
customer_reviews.text: These have good sound. The battery life is exceptional and the controls are quite easy to work (volume next, previous, pause, answer phone) even with gloves. I like that is reports it status (what its connected to and battery level). Stays connected to my device and range is what is expected for Bluetooth (30 - 80'). I bought these for the Active Noise Canceling. It works well for me while cutting the grass and very well using circular saws. They are reasonably comfortable, but get heavy (but not to sweaty) after around 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: IngleMike

customer_reviews.title: Love of my love Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about them , they are durable , comfortable with great Bass and noise cancellation, and finally love the feature where you remove your headphones it automatically pauses the song. Very recommended , i use them for travelling and indoors because they are very valuable !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bulky, heavy and awesome
customer_reviews.text: It is bulky, it is heavy but that's not a deal breaker at all. Also, it's pretty affordable for such a quality piece of hardware. The only negative thing I can say about it is that PC wireless connection is terrible. But in that case I just use the cable. It connects to my 2 cell phones perfectly and its battery life is amazing. So far, no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: A good value purchase! Was using Beats earphones and these are of excellent quality with nice features like instant off when not using, noise cancelling & mute buttons. Also really nice battery life 24 hrs per charge. Slight downside is they feel a little heavier but no big deal when saving $150-200 from Bose & Beats. A really surprisingly quality and great value purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are very comfortable and when I used them with the cable
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very comfortable and when I used them with the cable, the sound was outstanding. The on-headset controls are very handy: volume, track selection, microphone, auto-stop/start not to mention the bluetooth and NFC capabilities. I had only one issue with the headphones, when I activated the noise-cancellation, the sound quality suffered. I need good audio quality with noise cancellation, these headphones did not offer that. My Audio-Technica headphones are not as comfortable, they offer better audio quality with the noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: 4running

customer_reviews.title: i bought these and absolutely love them! great battery life
customer_reviews.text: i bought these and absolutely love them! great battery life, great sound, links up with my android phone automatically every time i turn it on, great distance from my phone, the noise canceling is not the best but does make a difference. would highly recommend these and the price compared to all the big names, they are a steal.
customer_reviews.author: William Striby

customer_reviews.title: I managed them for over a year and the outer linings ripped apart last week so it's time to get something new with a better make quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 2yrs ago and the inner earcup linings started ripping after 8 months of casual/gym use. I managed them for over a year and the outer linings ripped apart last week so it's time to get something new with a better make quality, preferably stitched earcups. I was shocked to see the latest backbeat version with the same poorly flawed design. I also had numerous bluetooth issues but won't blame Plantronics entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not purchase again. Stopped charging/holding a charge.
customer_reviews.text: At first this was a great product. The sound is great and the bluetooth connectivity worked well but shortly after the battery stopped charging and my device became a very expensive paperweight. I tried to receive support but unfortunately the warranty expired even though it was less than 20 months old. If the product stops working and the company does not support it even though it is not that old, how can anyone recommend this product or company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: You wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The best wireless headphones I own,The battery last for days and has outlasted my phone device's batteries on multiple occasions ,My only caveat is the distance you can be away from the source I'm getting outdoors around 20 to 25 feet and indoors around twenty.
customer_reviews.author: joed9591

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones, outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, better customer service. The ear pieces started to show wear and tear after 3 years (although that's typical for Maui weather to be pretty hard on materials). I notified Plantronics, and they allowed me to exchange them for a pair of PRO 2's at a low price (out of warranty replacement plan). Very satisfied with customer service. Overall not as good of noise cancelling as some headphones out there, but the sound is decent and the performance for price is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: bought refurbished and it was just like new. battery lasts forever. sound is awesome. used on a plane for noise cancellation, also awesome. only drawback is they are pretty wide when on, so they hit stuff occasionally. i expect they will last well.
customer_reviews.author: Grinchy

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Great value. Compared to the new wireless Bose noise canceling headphones, I feel that the Bose are about 25% better in both comfort, looks, and noise canceling ability. But these are half the price. These do get uncomfortable after about 4 hours, but I just take a little break to let my ears recover.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, cheap crap that breaks
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap pieces of crap. They sound good but after a couple months of use they break. It keeps pausing the music over and over again. You have to press the play button at lease once a minute, sometimes it won't even play at all it just keeps on pausing over and over again. Totally broken and I have taken extremely good care of them, always keep them in the case and have never dropped them. For the price I expected them to last longer then a couple months. I feel robbed. I wish I would have just got bose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Ear Cushions, no replacements available from Plantronics
customer_reviews.text: Ear Cushions don't last. Plantronics doesn't even offer a replacement. Seam split on both cushions, had to go to over seas supplier to get non original replacement.
customer_reviews.author: B. R. Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price, when more than one device are connected they tend to cut in and out. Other than that I have had no issues with these. I travel a lot and they do a good job cutting droning or repetitive noises. I have used them for music and books on MP3 on several flights. My dog tried to chew off one ear pad and it just popped back on after and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Swordwright the majic user

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent passive noise cancelation. Also has a good range of sound from lows to highs. Charge lasts for several hours...I've used them in airports and it drowns out most noise by design alone. I have yet to use the ANC but I'm sure it would work just fine. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a set of "budget" over the ear style headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality! It sounds better than the equivalent Beats, Bose, and Skull Candy (tried out all of them). Pairs with two devices simultaneously. The only downside is they are heavier than about everything else; however, that is not an issue for me, it's not a bad tradeoff for saving over $100 over the Bose and Beats.
customer_reviews.author: King Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: An 'OK' sound quality and poor construction and battery life
customer_reviews.text: While I cannot comment much on the sound quality because i use it mostly for listening in to classes and trainings, the quality of the product itself is not that great and with my minimal use of a about 5-10 hours a month, I already have the ear pieces ripped off. The battery life right from the beginning is just about 2-3 hours on Bluetooth. When more than one device syncs to it, the audio quality falls from OK to downright terrible
customer_reviews.author: Swami

customer_reviews.title: Sensors and media keys don't work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my son in October for Christmas. Immediately after he received it, the muting sensor in the left ear cup stopped working. The play/pause button is extremely finicky and requires the headset being restarted for it to start working again. One extra star for the ANC being great on a plane and the audio is quite good. However, for $150 (listed now for $180), this is definitely not worth it. I'll avoid Plantronics in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower

customer_reviews.title: something loose inside.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these headphones a short amount of time and the right side something is loose so if I use them while moving It totally ruins the sound out of that side, unfortunately I only realized this issue outside of the warranty window. Otherwise the noise canceling, sound quality,and comfort are good, the battery life is great.
customer_reviews.author: will w

customer_reviews.title: These sound great. They're comfortable and battery life is amazing
customer_reviews.text: These sound great. They're comfortable and battery life is amazing. I use them while on the tractor mowing. 50hp diesel tractor with an 8ft mower makes a lot noise. These things reduce the noise level very well, i stream music while mowing and the volume can be low and clear. My ears are much happier after mowing now.
customer_reviews.author: CAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really good, direct connection with my laptop sometimes fails (that's why they have the bluetooth receiver). Overall comfy for short periods, I've worn these for more than 8 hours and your ears kinda hurt because you press them with the middle part without the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: José Godoy

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling not the best and I had to download some software on my phone and computer to get them to work properly. I would have given these 4 or 5 stars, but after having these for less than a year, the material on the ear pieces started to peel off. I have only them worn a few times, so this sub-par quality is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all, bad customer support
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a year, then a couple month after the warranty expired ( how strange... ) , the ear piece is ripping at the seam. These headphones haven't travelled a lot ( was mostly using them at work ) and I took good care of them. Only response from Plantronics was that I could buy a refurb at discounted price ( which is ~20 cheaper than a new one on Amazon... ) I paid 220$ for these headphones, I wasn't expecting to have to replace them every year...
customer_reviews.author: Maxime

customer_reviews.title: I love them, but they feel uncomfy after 2 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them, but they feel uncomfy after 2 hours of usage. The sound is great (with eq ofc) the battery is good, as a couch gamer of 2 house daily they hold for weeks. The mic is good for skype usage etc.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with the audio quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after detailed review of other options. I was happy with the audio quality, but after a little over a year the side control buttons stopped functioning and product support would not honor warranty because the purchase was over a year old. I had plantations Bluetooth sport headphones with the same problem and failure. Extremely poor quality and I am disappointed in customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth calling never worked
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones but the calling feature leaves much to be desired, I could hear the person on the other end but they couldn't ever hear me. Once again excellent headphones!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headphones
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, and adjustable. Sound quality is amazing. Use it at home for Bluetooth phone device or for listening to Amazon music.
customer_reviews.author: SI

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones. They're a little warm when worn for ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. They're a little warm when worn for a long time but my ears don't hurt. The Bluetooth functionality is amazing one of the best I have ever had. The noise cancellation I would rate 8/10 not as good as Bose but for the price you cannot beat it. The reason I bought these over the Bose was the ability to play Bluetooth music and have noise cancellation wirelessly without having to plug it in. The battery life is remarkable!!!!!! They last for days.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Livengood

customer_reviews.title: I really like these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones, however, after moderate use (3 8 hour flights, and maybe 3 - 4 times a month, the leather around the ear pieces has split. They still work great, but the glue on the seam has pulled free. Granted I've had them almost 2 years, but they haven't seen heavy use like some other's I've had which have lasted 3-4 years and they are falling apart. Like I said, still sound great and work very well, just falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hartline

customer_reviews.title: Great design and value. Only a couple gripes
customer_reviews.text: Great design. No complaints other than the cheap plastic look and the on/off and ANR buttons feel very cheap. But functionally these things are very impressive, even using bluetooth. Sound great and comfortable for a couple 16hr flights to Asia. Hope to do side-by-side comparison someday to Bose. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Good Device
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Good passive noise blocking and active noise cancelation. Bluetooth connection is super simple to a Galaxy 5 phone. I have been using these while mowing the grass and can listen to music and voice audio at a low volume level without issue. Phone calls also come in even with mower running.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Epic headphones. You can't do better for the money. The interface is really funky and usable as well. They have a unique if a little awkward look but are very comfortable. The only weak point is the noise canceling it works well but not as well as other headphones in it's class. That being said nothing even close to this price sounds as good and I have owned Bose, Sony, Beats, SH, B and O. These just stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Lemke

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great, and these work really, really well. Unfortunately, they are too heavy. My neck is sore after only 20 mins
customer_reviews.author: Meesha

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are very comfortable to wear, even with the fully closed structure there isn't any "suffocating ears" feeling. Noise cancelation blocks the background noise although don't expect miracles if you want to completely block out conversations in your surroundings - ANC is generally not capable of that. The active microphone is a cool feature: it makes your phone calls more natural by letting you listen to your own voice as well and second, you may listen to conversations in your surroundings without removing the headphones. Battery life is great, charging is done very quickly. The comfort feature of stopping by and staring the music when taking the headphones off and putting them back on also works great with Android.
customer_reviews.author: Tamas Katona

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: At first these rocked! Then suddenly the buttons on the cups would not work. They turned into dumb bluetooth headphones. After about an hour of wear the top of my head would start hurting. The noise canceling is ok - works best when music is fairly loud. Sound quality is great. Doesn't do highs too well, bass was excellent. All in all, I ended up returning these. I am looking for something just a bit more... perfected.
customer_reviews.author: Dport66

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely the pair of headphones with the most ...
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the pair of headphones with the most bang for buck at the time of writing. Even the Plus model, which supposedly gives you added quality by including a dedicated bluetooth receiver module, is less value than this. The quality remains the same, and the battery life remains the same. Def consider this over over-priced Bose and BEATs models.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew John Thanabalan

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Plantronics for making travel great.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I am a frequent flyer and these are the most important thing I travel with. They are very comfortable. Most earphones hurt my ears, these do not. Control sound and music without pulling out our phone or tablet with on ear controls. Connect two devices both android and iphone. Battery life for days. Only complaint is that they sometime start hiccuping (rare), but then a quick powercycle fixes it.
customer_reviews.author: Lunchbox Lama

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones packed with Features .........
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine today all the way from US to India. I have a Bose QC 15 but wanted something that is wireless and could be used in office also without making a statement. So after some testing of the beats studio and bose wireless decided to try the plantronics. All I can say is you would not be disappointed. It is one of the best wireless headphones in terms of sound and features. The Build and comfort is excellent and just feel a Quality product which does what it says. One thing I would have preferred is a Hard case.
customer_reviews.author: ARam

customer_reviews.title: i got these because of the great reviews i read online and they really didn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: i got these because of the great reviews i read online and they really didn't disappoint. my husband travels a lot for work and wanted headphones that really had great noise canceling features but could seamlessly go to a bluetooth work call. these can do it all! LOVE
customer_reviews.author: andrea roehm

customer_reviews.title: I love these. 1
customer_reviews.text: I love these. 1. They are built like a quality product should be, even the case is nice. 2. They have great battery life and noise canceling and don't require extra batteries because they are rechargeable. Combine that with bluetooth and you have a great pair of headphones. Also, they have battery and status announced over the drivers when they are on your ears!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Pairs nicely with multiple devices (so I don't miss a phone call when listening the music from my laptop), intelligently pauses the music when I take them off. My ears were hurting initially but after several days it felt all right. Absolutely love these headphones. Microphone quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: Microphone Is Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy if you want this product for the microphone - which I did. I brought it to work and I got overwhelming feedback that the mic quality was poor. If you want this product for good sounds and noise cancelling then it does a decent job. Material quality is also good.
customer_reviews.author: OnlinePurchaser

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Really good. A bit on the clunky side. Does everything really well. Battery life is a beast, I'm getting over a week per charge with a little use each day. Nose canceling is good, not as good as Bose as others have said. To me, sound quality is great. Only thing I wish to have on it is an easier way to switch between two Bluetooth devices.
customer_reviews.author: Bmango

product_meta.title: Plantronics BackBeat PRO Wireless Noise Canceling Hi-Fi Headphones with Mic - Compatible with iPhone, iPad, Android, and Other Smart Devices
product_meta.description: Plantronics Backbeat PRO wireless, active noise canceling headphones with mic
feature_bullets: NOISE-CANCELING HEADPHONES: Block out background noise while working, relaxing, and traveling with on-demand active noise canceling technology.

MULTIPLE DEVICE SYNC TECHNOLOGY: Listen to a movie on your tablet and quickly answer the call on your smartphone; these headphones are compatible with all smart devices including iPhone, iPad, and Droid devices.
HIGH QUALITY AUDIO: Rich and lifelike audio delivering rich bass, crisp high, and natural midtones through extremely comfortable headphones.
LONG LASTING BATTERY LIFE: The Plantronics technology offers up to 24 hours of listening while providing 330 feet of Bluetooth range.
COMFORT: Perfect travel and in-flight headphones include pillow soft earcups to provide lasting comfort while canceling and isolating background noise.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,541 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
